section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This chapter may be cited as the “Office of the Chief Tenant Advocate Establishment Act”.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2061 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Section 5 of D.C. Law 16-181 provided: “Section 2 through 4 shall apply as of October 1, 2007.”
